org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful

Class RestfulDiffuserApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.ws.rs.core.Application
      • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.RestfulDiffuserApplication

  • public class RestfulDiffuserApplication
extends javax.ws.rs.core.Application
    Defines the resources that are created per request and only once (singletons) for the JAX-RS application.
    Author:
    rob

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestfulDiffuserApplication

        public RestfulDiffuserApplication(java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> singletonResources,
                          java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> perRequestResClasses)
        Constructs the application object with the specified singleton objects, and the per-request classes.
        Parameters:
        singletonResources - The resources that are singletons, and therefore, live across many requests.
        perRequestResClasses - The resources that are create for each request, and then destroyed.

      • RestfulDiffuserApplication

        Basic no-arg constructor

      • addSingletonResource

        public boolean addSingletonResource(java.lang.Object singletonResource)
        Adds an object as a resource that spans multiple requests
        Parameters:
        singletonResource - The resource object that is to be a singleton resource
        Returns:
        true if the resource object was added; false otherwise

      • addPerRequestResource

        public boolean addPerRequestResource(java.lang.Class<?> perRequestResource)
        Adds a Class to the set of resources that will be created for each request
        Parameters:
        perRequestResource - A Class that will act as a resource that will be created for each request
        Returns:
        true if the resource's Class was added; false otherwise
